cause.description:
Its been well over a decade since Jurassic Park came out and most people still lack sufficient safety measures to protect their homes from the imminent velociraptor attack.
1. Raptors move at 10m/s.
2. Raptors CAN open doors.
3. Raptors do not know fear.
cause.mission: Save our children from their bloodthirsty jaws
cause.name: Raptor Awareness
